attributes.title: Shivaratri Special Series - 1: Awaken Yourself
attributes.description:
In this video taken from Paramahamsa Nithyananda's previous Shivaratri message, the qualities of Shiva are described. Shiva is described to have experienced inner awakening, traditionally called the raising of the Kundalini. Paramahamsa Nithyananda elaborates on this further in his message by describing the different stories from Shiva's life that actually represent the raising of Kundalini. Next Shivaratri special clip: Awaken Yourself - Kill Manmadha & AWaken Muladhara.

Come, Experience Maha Shivaratri in the presence of living enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda. Witness the powerful Rudra Homa, take a holy dip in the healing tank - Vaidyasarovar which houses the 21-feet Navapashana (nine elements) Shiva Linga and get blessings from the Master on this auspicious day. And to top it all, the master stroke for the night is Shiva Kundalini Dhyaan (meditation) that will be guided by the Master Himself. 

Come experience the vibrant enlightening energy of the Nithyananda Dhyanapeetam ashram in Bidadi on Shivaratri, 12-13 February 2010.

For other programs including the 21-day meditation program - Inner Awakening and Haridwar Kumbh Mela 2010, please log on to www.dhyanapeetam.org
